title: Does society improve when people give up on God? Peterson/Dillahunty Q/A #2 Part 2
description:
Part 2 of dealing with Question 2 in the conversation. Does secular humanism lead to the "bodies stacking up" of communism or has it never been tried? Do secular people get rational or do they sacrilize the self? 

Full conversation https://youtu.be/FmH7JUeVQb8

Tim Keller Preaching https://www.amazon.com/Preaching-Communicating-Faith-Age-Skepticism-ebook/dp/B00OQSF8QS

Don Hoffman Ted Talk https://youtu.be/oYp5XuGYqqY 

Matt Dillahunty/Slick Debate https://youtu.be/EKlycI9ZKsY
